text: The Bazaar, 1856, oil on canvas laid on board. Alexandre Defaux (1826–1900) was a French artist. He was born in Bercy and studied under Jean-Baptiste- Camille Corot. He was a member of the Barbizon School. ==List of Paintings== * Brassée de fleurs dans une jardinière * Les Cerisiers en fleurs en Normandie * Country Landscape with Flowering Trees * Feeding Time * In the Shelter of the Stack * Intérieur de Paris. Barricade de 1830 * Normandy Farm House * Paysage en Normandie * Poules pres d'un puits * A Fishing Village Category:19th- century French painters Category:French male painters Category:1826 births Category:1900 deaths Category:Pont-Aven painters Category:19th-century male artists
title: Alexandre Defaux
